mapper.select: SELECT t.`pkid` ,t.`pro_id` ,t.`pro_name` ,t.`pro_type` ,t.`explore_org` ,t.`com_id` ,t.`design_org` ,t.`check_org` ,t.`check_finish_date` FROM tb_project_design t WHERE t.`pro_id` = #{proId} GROUP BY t.`sgtxh`
SELECT t.* ,t1.`pro_scope` FROM tb_project_design t LEFT JOIN tb_project t1 ON t.`pro_id` = t1.`pro_id` WHERE t.`pro_id` = #{proId} limit 1

SELECT t.`pkid` ,t.`check_org` ,t.`design_org` ,t.`explore_org` ,t2.`org_code` AS checkOrgCode ,t3.`org_code` AS designOrgCode ,t4.`org_code` AS exploreOrgCode ,t3.`regis_address` AS regisAddressDesign ,t4.`regis_address` AS regisAddressExplore FROM tb_project_design t LEFT JOIN tb_company t2 ON t.`check_org` = t2.`com_name` LEFT JOIN tb_company t3 ON t.`design_org` = t3.`com_name` LEFT JOIN tb_company t4 ON t.`explore_org` = t4.`com_name` WHERE t.`pro_id` = #{proId}
SELECT t.`display_name` FROM mishu.`area` t WHERE t.`path` = SUBSTRING_INDEX( (SELECT t1.`path` FROM mishu.`area` t1 WHERE t1.`name` = #{name}), ',', 1 )

SELECT t.* ,t2.`org_code` AS checkOrgCode ,t3.`org_code` AS designOrgCode ,t4.`org_code` AS exploreOrgCode ,t3.`regis_address` AS regisAddressDesign ,t4.`regis_address` AS regisAddressExplore FROM tb_project_design t LEFT JOIN tb_company t2 ON t.`check_org` = t2.`com_name` LEFT JOIN tb_company t3 ON t.`design_org` = t3.`com_name` LEFT JOIN tb_company t4 ON t.`explore_org` = t4.`com_name` WHERE t.`pkid` = #{pkid} GROUP BY t.`pkid`

SELECT t.`explore_org` AS comName ,t1.`org_code` AS orgCode ,(SELECT t3.display_name FROM mishu.`area` t3 WHERE t3.path = SUBSTRING_INDEX(t2.`path`,',',1)) AS province ,'勘查单位' AS companyType FROM tb_project_design t LEFT JOIN tb_company t1 ON t.`explore_org` = t1.`com_name` LEFT JOIN mishu.`area` t2 ON t1.`regis_address` = t2.`name` WHERE t.`pro_id` = #{proId} AND t.`type` = 'explore' GROUP BY t1.`com_id`

SELECT t.`design_org` AS comName ,t1.`org_code` AS orgCode ,(SELECT t3.display_name FROM mishu.`area` t3 WHERE t3.path = SUBSTRING_INDEX(t2.`path`,',',1)) AS province ,'勘查单位' AS companyType FROM tb_project_design t LEFT JOIN tb_company t1 ON t.`design_org` = t1.`com_name` LEFT JOIN mishu.`area` t2 ON t1.`regis_address` = t2.`name` WHERE t.`pro_id` = #{proId} AND t.`type` = 'design' GROUP BY t1.`com_id`
select t.pro_id from tb_project_design t WHERE t.`com_id` = #{comId} group by t.pro_id
select t.* ,t1.pro_where ,t1.pro_type as proTypeMain from tb_project_design t left join tb_project t1 on t.pro_id = t1.pro_id where t.pkid = #{pkid} limit 1
